function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using AI algorithms to design new molecules or repurpose drugs may lead to unforeseen side effects or interactions with existing medications.","Impact":"Unforeseen side effects or interactions could pose health risks to patients.","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive safety testing and clinical trials to ensure the safety and efficacy of the new molecules or repurposed drugs.","Technologies":"Advanced AI algorithms for virtual screening and predictive modeling.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, pharmaceutical companies.","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, regulatory agencies, healthcare professionals."},{"Description":"Sharing vast amounts of treatment data globally using AI tools may raise concerns about data privacy and security.","Impact":"Potential exposure of sensitive patient information and privacy breaches.","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption and security measures, comply with data protection regulations, obtain patient consent for data sharing.","Technologies":"Secure data transmission protocols, encryption technologies, data anonymization techniques.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, data scientists.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, data management companies, regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Reliance on AI for diagnosis and treatment decision-making may lead to misinterpretation of medical data and incorrect clinical decisions.","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, incorrect treatment, and compromised patient safety.","Mitigation":"Validation of AI recommendations by healthcare professionals, continuous monitoring and updating of AI algorithms, training and education for healthcare staff on AI use.","Technologies":"AI validation tools, real-time monitoring systems, AI education platforms.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, AI developers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, AI developers, medical institutions."}]}
